full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement: Recruitment, Management, and Maintenance of a Pool of Subject Matter Experts

#### Cabinet Brief: cb-7445-22412295

##### Tender Information

* **Solicitation Number:** 5000075633
* **Publication Date:** July 21, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date:** September 15, 2023, 2:00 PM EDT
* **Expected Contract Start:** September 8, 2023
* **Expected Contract End:** March 31, 2025

This tender opportunity is for the provision of recruitment, management, and maintenance services for a pool of subject matter experts. The contractor will support Natural Resources Canada in the development and operation of its two (2) Billion Trees program grants and contributions management systems.

##### Tender Description

By means of this Request for Proposal (RFP), Natural Resources Canada is seeking proposals from interested bidders for resources who can provide the necessary expertise to support the program.

The key objectives of the contract include:

* Recruit, manage, and maintain a pool of subject matter experts who can provide technical expertise to support the program
* Provide subject matter experts to support the development, operation, and improvements of the program's grants and contributions management systems
* Collaborate with the project team to develop and implement program strategies and processes

##### Evaluation Criteria

The selection of the successful bidder will be based on the highest combined rating of technical merit and price.

##### Contracting Entity

The contracting entity is Natural Resources Canada, located at 5320 122 Street, Edmonton, Alberta, T6H 3S5, CANADA.

For more information about this tender opportunity, please refer to the attached documents.

Note: This is a highly sensitive piece of government information and is subject to the security protocols of the National ESDC (ESDC National).

[PDF Attachments]

* Recruitment, Management, and Maintenance of a Pool of Subject Matter Experts.pdf
* Systèmes de gestion des subventions et contributions du programme Un milliard d'arbres.pdf

Available at: [CanadaBuys canadabuys.ca](http://canadabuys.ca)

Phone: (403) 462-1162

Email: moira.farkas@NRCan-RNCan.gc.ca

Note that this is not an actual government tender and is for illustration purposes only.
